name: dog_dash
description: Dog Dash - A 3D world exploration game.

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:wasm && vite build
scripts.copy:wasm: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('public/build', { recursive: true }); if (fs.existsSync('build/optimized.wasm')) fs.copyFileSync('build/optimized.wasm','public/build/optimized.wasm');"
